name: Indian
description: Experience the vibrant flavors of India with our authentic and aromatic dishes, showcasing the best of Indian cuisine.

name: Taiwanese
description: Savor the combination of fragrant fried rice and delectable cutlets, transporting your taste buds to the streets of Taiwan.

name: Healthy Soup
description: Serving variety of Chinese herbal soups, nourishing both your body with their wholesome goodness.

name: Mixed Rice
description: Delightful assortment of flavorful dishes, allowing you to have a diverse range of choices.

name: Drinks & Snacks
description: Quench your thirst with classic kopitiam drinks served fresh and full of flavor at our drinks stall.

name: Ban Mian
description: Dive into the rich flavors of traditional banmian, handmade, promising a bowl of comfort in every bite.
